channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Senate just blocked California from becoming the first state to ban the sale of new gas-powered cars as the Trump administration doubles down on fossil fuels
item.description: Republicans say the phaseout of gas-powered cars is costly for consumers and manufacturers, and puts pressure on the nation’s energy grid.

item.title: 15 years ago, a software developer paid for two pizzas with 10,000 bitcoin. Those pies would be worth $1.1 billion today
item.description: The two Papa John’s pizzas delivered to Laszlo Hanyecz's Florida home in May 2010 were worth about $41 at the time.

item.description: She’s a talented artist, but she needs to avoid rich, white, liberal groupthink, since it’ll ruin her work.

item.description: Democrat Abigail Spanberger has a double-digit lead over Republican Winsome Earle-Sears in Virginia's governor's race, according to a recent poll.

item.description: Bieber quickly discovered that motherhood changes women. The good news is, that change is almost always for the better.

item.description: The bill states any nonprofit that 'provides for abortions' and received more than $1 million in 2024 is off limits for future funding.
